mapper.select: SELECT ins_name FROM X2_InstitutionCode WHERE ins_cd=#{ins_cd}
SELECT accession_num FROM D1_Common WHERE accession_num=#{accession_num} AND ins_cd=#{ins_cd}
SELECT uid FROM D1_Common WHERE accession_num=#{access_num} AND ins_cd=#{ins_cd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO E1_Synonym( uid, synonym_id, synonym ) VALUES( #{uid}, SF_GET_NEW_SYNONYM_ID(#{uid}), #{synonym} )
INSERT INTO D1_Observation( uid, obs_id, latitude, longitude ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, #{gps.latitude}, #{gps.longitude} )
INSERT INTO D1_Individual( uid, individual_id, individual_type, individual_maintenance ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, #{individualType}, #{individualMaintenance} )
INSERT INTO D1_Organ( uid, organ_id, organ_type, disease ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, #{organ_type}, #{disease} )
INSERT INTO D1_Source( uid, source_id, source_type, disease ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, #{source}, #{disease} )
INSERT INTO D1_Seed( uid, seed_id, seed_status ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, #{seedStatus} )
INSERT INTO D1_Embryo( uid, embryo_id, embryo_type ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, #{embryo} )
INSERT INTO D1_Strain( uid, strain_id, source, pathogenic_yn, strain_name ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, #{source}, #{pathogenicYn}, #{strainName} )
INSERT INTO D1_CellStrain( uid, cellstrain_id, source, cell_type, cell_name ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, #{source}, #{cellLineType}, #{cellLineName} )
INSERT INTO D1_BodyFluid( uid, body_fluid_id, body_fluid_type ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, #{bodyFluidType} )

INSERT INTO D1_ProteinSequence( uid, protein_seq_id, source, protein_name, accession_no, sequence, open_yn, open_url ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, #{source}, #{proteinName}, #{accessionNo}, #{sequence}, #{open.openYn}, #{open.openUrl} )
INSERT INTO D1_Expression( uid, expression_id, source, data_type, expression_data, open_yn, open_url ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, #{source}, #{dataType}, #{sequence}, #{open.openYn}, #{open.openUrl} )

INSERT INTO D1_Sturcture( uid, structure_id, source, structure_type, accession_no, pdb_format, open_yn, open_url ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, #{source}, #{sturctureType}, #{accessionNo}, #{pdbFormat}, #{open.openYn}, #{open.openUrl} )
INSERT INTO D1_Etc( uid, etc_id, description, open_yn, open_url ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, #{description}, #{open.openYn}, #{open.openUrl} )
INSERT INTO D1_Extraction( uid, extract_id, source, solvent, extract_time ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, #{source}, #{extract.solvent}, #{extract.extractTime} )
INSERT INTO E1_Culture( `uid`, `id`, `culture_medium_name`, `condition`, `succeed_dt`, `succeed_time` ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, #{culture_medium_name}, #{condition}, #{succeed_dt}, #{succeed_time} )
INSERT INTO E1_Store( uid, id, store_no, store_place ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, #{storeNo}, #{storePlace} )
INSERT INTO E1_Distribution( uid, id, dist_yn, dist_url ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, #{dist_yn}, #{dist_url} )
INSERT INTO E1_Reference( uid, id, ord, ref_no, reference ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, SF_GET_NEW_REFERENCE_ORD(#{accession}, #{id}), #{ref_no}, #{reference} )
INSERT INTO E1_Patent( uid, id, application_no, reg_no ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id}, #{parentNo}, #{reg_no} )
INSERT INTO L3_ExtendLink( uid, id ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{id} )
